import React from "react"; import { secondsToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function DisplaySession ({ session, focusDuration, breakDuration }) { if (session === null) return null; return (
{/* TODO: This area should show only when there is an active focus or break - i.e. the session is running or is paused */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) total duration */}

{session?.label} for 25:00 minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below correctly format the time remaining in the current session */}

{session?.timeRemaining} remaining

) } export default DisplaySession;
